page.title: 09LOCAL DISTRICT COUNCILLOR
page.content: Mr.J.F.Munro is the Local District Councillor as well as being a business man.He serves on the Skye and Lochalsh District Council which has its centre in Portree and has a population within the boundaries of 10000 people.One of the major problems faced by the District Council is the lack of housing to rent. There are 400 people on the waiting list yet many of the houses in the area are let for holiday homes.Mr Munro would like to see more local people involved in local activities such as crofting and agriculture.He felt that the land ownership system prevented this.He also feels that small workshops would be desirable and would create in Lochalsh the active community which once was there.
